title: Westworld
creator: Jonathan Nolan
Lisa Joy
consensus_highlights: Westworld is a philosophical sci-fi epic set in a futuristic theme park where android hosts serve wealthy guests. Jonathan Nolan and Lisa Joy created a mind-bending exploration of consciousness, free will, and the nature of reality, with stunning visuals and complex narrative puzzles.
notes: The show sparked massive online speculation and theory-crafting. While later seasons divided critics, the first two seasons are considered masterful examples of prestige science fiction television.
